Timeless Body: Suffers no aging penalties
Trackless Step: Untrackable outdoors
Woodland Stride: May move normally through undergrowth

Magic Notes:
Wisdom Druid Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level D1, D2, D3
A Thousand Faces: May use Alter Self effects at will
Acid Dart: R30' Ranged touch inflicts 1d6+10 HP 6/dy
Enlarge Spell: May use +1 spell slot to dbl chosen spell range
Lightning Lord: May use Call Lightning effects with multiple bolts w/in 15' radius each rd for 20 bolts/dy
Maximize Spell: May use +3 spell slot to maximize all variable effects on chosen spell
Speak With Animals: May use Speak With Animals effects 23 rd/dy
Spontaneous Druid Spell: May cast Summon Nature's Ally in place of known spell
Wild Shape: May change into creature of size diminutive-huge/elemental/plant for 20 hr unlimited/dy
Companions
Animal Companion: Crocodile "Waskupvis"
Str: 21 (+5) Dex: 22 (+6) Con: 17 (+3) Int: 1 (-5) Wis: 12 (+1) Cha: 2 (-4) Size: S Speed: 30 Tricks/Feats/Skills: 10/8/16
HD/HP: 16/120 Init: +6 AC: 33 Attack: +19 1d6+7 CMB/CMD: +16/32 Fort/Ref/Will: +13/+16/+6
Animal Companion Features: Companion Evasion; Companion Improved Evasion; Devotion; Link; Multiattack; Share Spells
Companion Notes:
Companion Evasion: Reflex save yields no damage instead of half
Companion Improved Evasion: Failed Reflex save yields half damage
Devotion: +4 Will vs. enchantment
Multiattack: Reduces additional attack penalty to -2 or gives second attack at -5
Share Spells: Master may share self spell w/adjacent companion
Notes
Validation Warnings: Animal Domain: Implies knowledge (nature) skill
Validation Errors: Selectable Feature Allocation: 1 available vs. 8 allocated
